app.name: TolokaBee
app.about:
This app was created to connect volunteers and people in need. Be kind and open but do not share any sensitive info.
If the app requires any data about you to be shown to other people - you will be notified.

The map does not reflect user location accurately to protect user data. Some "user locations" might be generated by the app. Please do not use this app for navigation.
Support can be contacted using mail : lerazip32@gmail.com

Created by KPI Student as final project. Â© 2025

oops.error.occurred: Oops! An error occurred. Please restart the app.

hello.title: Hello{name}!
hello.subtitle:
What a great day to give somebody a hand!
Or to ask for a hand.

actions.question: What are we doing today?
actions.dialog.header: There are 2 options - to give or to ask for a hand.
actions.dialog.explanation: To give a hand means to help somebody (volunteer) and to ask for a hand mean to request help (need help).
actions.dialog.note.one: Please take into account there is no shame to ask for help. We are all humans and we all need help sometimes.
actions.dialog.note.location: Exact location of any user is not accurately reflected on the map to protect your and others privacy. More information can be found in the request form or by clicking on app logo at the top-right corner.

login.title: Login
login.banned: Your account is banned until {date}. If you think there was an error, please contact support.
login.banned_info: Support can be contacted by clicking on the app logo at the top-right corner of the map screen.

account.title: Create an account
account.name: Name
account.age.limitations: You must be at least 18 years old to use this app.

position.title: Who do you want to be?
position.subtitle: Select what applies to you the best
position.tooltip:
Volunteer will receive a notification if any request appears within the set radius. Requester can help as well but they will not receive any notifications.
You can change this later in your profile.
This will help us to show you the most relevant information.

about.title: About you
about.subtitle:
Tell us a bit more about yourself. People will see this information when they see your request.
Tell your story and why you might need extra help.

account.error: Error occurred while creating an account. Please try again later.
account.success: Account created successfully. Welcome to Toloka Bee!

contact.title: How do you want to be contacted?
contact.subtitle: Select your preferred method of contact

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
By using this application, you agree to abide by the principles of mutual respect, honesty, and safety.

This service does not store your location data on a continuous basis. Your precise geographic location is only shared with a volunteer once they have explicitly accepted your request for help. Prior to that moment, only an approximate or intentionally obfuscated location may be used to match you with potential helpers nearby.

All requests and users on the platform are subject to moderation. Administrators have the authority to review complaints submitted by users and may take action, including issuing temporary or permanent bans, in order to maintain a safe environment for everyone.

If you believe a request is fraudulent, offensive, or violates community standards, you may submit a complaint. The same applies to users who display inappropriate behavior. All complaints are reviewed manually and confidentially.

By continuing to use this application, you acknowledge that you understand these terms and agree to use the service in a responsible, ethical manner that fosters cooperation and community trust.

actions.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

edit.title: Edit profile
edit.name: Name
edit.position: Who do you want to be?

contacts.title: Your contacts:
contacts.subtitle:
Your contacts will be shown to other user when they accept your request.
In case they have any questions, they will be able to contact you directly.
contacts.no:
No contacts available.
Please add at least one contact to help the ones who help you.
contacts.error: Error occurred while updating contacts. Please try again later.

warning.title: Welcome to Toloka Bee
warning.message: The map does not reflect user location accurately to protect user data. Some "user locations" might be generated by the app. Please do not use this app for navigation.

screen.title: Error
screen.message: An error occurred. Please restart the app.

password.rules: Your password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit, and one special character (@, !).

field.not.number: This field must be a number.
field.min.value: This value must be at least {value}.
field.max.value: This value must be at most {value}.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

password.max.length: Password must be at most 32 characters long.
password.min.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

rules.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
rules.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
rules.digits: Password must contain at least one digit.
rules.other.characters: Password must contain at least one special character (@, !).

hand.title: What help do you need?

type.title: What type of help do you need?
type.description: Select the type of help you need. This will help volunteers to find your request.
type.label: Type of help

hand.description: Describe the service that you need *
hand.description_title: Important note: your exact location is not shared with the other users. Please if you need the help at your specific location, write it in the description or ask users to contact you directly.
hand.no_contact_info:
No contact information available.
Please add at least one contact to help the ones who help you...

remote.title: Can be done remotely
remote.description: Pick if the task does not require a physical presence, it can be done remotely.

physical.title: Requires physical strength
physical.description: Pick if the task requires holding or moving large objects.

deadline.title: Select deadline
deadline.description: When do you need this task to be done? The request will be deleted after this date. Default value - in 1 week from now.

price.title: Price
price.description:
What is the approximate price for this task?
For example, if the task is to go to the shop, write approximate price of the shopping list. Leave empty if there is no price.
price.label: Price (â´)

volunteers.title: How many volunteers do you need?
volunteers.description:
Select how many volunteers do you need to complete this task.
Default value - 1.
Maximum value - 5.
volunteers.label: Volunteers

hand.thanks: Thank you for sharing your request with us. We will notify you when somebody accepts your request. Active requests can be found in the profile.
hand.error: Error occurred while creating a request. Please try again later.

request.limit_reached: You have reached the limit of active requests.
request.limit_reached_message: You can have only {limit} active requests at the same time. Please remove some of them to create a new one or wait until tomorrow.

details.price_hint: This is an approximate price if the user asked you to buy something for them. This is not a price for your service.
details.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this request? This action cannot be undone.
details.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this request? The requester will be notified about that.
details.cancel_volunteer_confirm: Are you sure you want to stop helping? If the volunteers were found, they will be notified about that.
details.cancel_error: Error occurred while canceling the request. Please try again later.
details.contacts_hint:
You can contact the user directly by clicking on their contact method. If you have any questions, please ask them directly.
Hold contact for a second to copy it.

delete.error: Error occurred while deleting the request. Please try again later.

request.title: Somebody close needs your help
request.body: Click on the button to see the details

report.error: Error occurred while reporting. Please try again later.

accept.success: Request accepted successfully. Now the request in progress is placed in your profile.
accept.error: Error occurred while accepting the request. Please try again later.
accept.already_accepted: Sorry. A volunteer has already accepted this request. Thank you for wanting to help! Give this help to another person.
accept.expired: Sorry. This request has expired. Thank you for wanting to help! Give this help to another person.

for_requester.accepted: Your request was accepted by a volunteer. Open to see the details.
for_requester.completed: Your request was marked as completed by the volunteer. Confirm that in the request details.
for_requester.cancelled: Your request was cancelled by the volunteer. Open to see the details.

for_volunteer.completed: Requester marked the request as completed. Thank you for your help!
for_volunteer.cancelled: Requester cancelled the request. Sorry, but you cannot help them anymore.

confirm.error: Error occurred while marking the request as completed. Please try again later.

hand.no_requests: No requests available at the moment. Check again later or set a bigger search radius.
hand.deadline: Needs to be done by {date} ({days} days left)
hand.title: Active Requests
hand.subtitle:
Personalized list of requests for you. Requests are sorted by your volunteering history.
Click on the request to see the details of any request.

error.title: Error
error.message: An error occurred. Please restart the app.

contacts.phone_search: Search by country or phone code
contacts.hint: You can add more contacts later in your profile by clicking on your image on the dashboard.
contacts.whatsapp_hint: Enter your number, a full phone number in international format. Omit any brackets, dashes, plus signs, and leading zeros when adding the phone number in international format.
contacts.viber_hint: Enter your number which is connected to a Viber account.
contacts.preferred_method_not_selected:
Preferred method of contact is not selected.
Please select it.
contacts.preferred_contact_not_selected:
Contact of your preferred method of contact is not set.
Please set it.

dialog.title: Submit a complaint
dialog.only_one_report: You can leave only one complaint per request or user.

complaint.block_user_message: Are you sure you want to block this user? This action can be undone only by contacting support.
complaint.delete_request_message: Are you sure you want to delete this request? This action cannot be undone.
complaint.delete_complaint_message: Are you sure you want to delete this complaint? This action cannot be undone.

snackbar.user_blocked_and_request_deleted: User blocked and request deleted successfully.
snackbar.request_deleted_and_user_blocked: Request deleted and user blocked successfully.
